metadata.title: Arctic Marine Computer Mapping and  Analysis System
metadata.description: The (CMAS:BCB) package is a computer-based mapping and analysis system that displays, in an interactive mode, temporal and spatial information for all living marine resources addressed in the publication; "Bering, Chukchi, and Beaufort Seas Coastal and Ocean Zones Strategic Assessment Data Atlas."  It has been developed for use on Macintosh-type computer systems and is designed for easy use/rapid update of distribution, abundance, and utilization information for individual species and species groups such as invertebrates, fishes, birds, and mammals.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: This computerized, interactive atlas represents a compendium of Arctic marine information (through 1986) from a variety of sources.  As an electronic "publication" it is easily updated.  This results in a dynamic document that is conveniently located on a researcher's or manager's desk.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: Contact Source.

Use constraints: None
